Texto: 
not available
chemotherapy
multiple well defined pulmonary nodules of varying sizes consistent with metastatic disease
lung metastatic disease
1) metastatic disease to the lungs:  given known history of colon carcinoma this is the main consideration.
25 y/o female with colon cancer
in general, multiple lung nodules has a differential of:

1) neoplasm (metastatic disease and lymphoma) 
2) infection (variety of etiologies including tb and fungal)
3) granulomatous disease
4) pneumoconiosis
